title: The Tutor
description:
It’s bad enough needing a tutor to rescue my grades.

But this guy’s tall, dark and brooding–and he resents every second with me.

Okay, I get it. He’s a busy postgrad and I’m a lowly student. He’s grumpy and I’m bouncy. And he thinks I’m wasting his precious time.But there’s no need to be rude. From our very first session, he’s so freaking judgy–like he took one look at me and figured me out on the spot. You’d think he’d know better, what with that cane.Well, there’s more to me than the gorgeous grump sees. And I’m going to prove it to him…One breathless study session at a time.
The Tutor is a short and steamy enemies-to-lovers instalove story, starring a brooding tutor and the ball-of-sunshine student who lights up his world.
author: Cassie Mint
